contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Bloomsbury Qatar Foundation Publishing To Host Book Launch Event For ‘The Holy Sail’

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Bloomsbury Qatar Foundation Publishing (BQFP), has announced the publication and book launch of The Holy Sail by Qatari novelist and writer Abdulaziz Al Mahmoud.

The celebrated journalist will discuss his second novel The Holy Sail on Monday evening on 24 November at Hamad bin Khalifa University’s Student Centre Cinema, located in Education City.

The Holy Sail is a historical fiction novel that guides readers around the medieval world of Lisbon, Cairo, Jeddah and Istanbul. Al Mahmoud uses historical research methods while at the same time weaving a tale of love, honor and nobility.

Copies of the book will be available to buy during the launch, with a special book signing being held at Tribe Bookstore in the Student Centre.

To attend the event, please RSVP bqfp.events@qf.org.qa.
